title: Southwest Airlines Stock Is Up on Solid Earnings. A Healthy Outlook Is Helping, Too.
text:
Southwest Airlines stock (ticker: LUV) rose Thursday on the heels of a better-than-expected third-quarter earnings report.

The back story. Southwest shares have climbed 15% year to date, which is below the S&P 500’s nearly 20% gain but better than peers, many of which have struggled this year. Southwest got a boost last month from its upbeat guidance, and the stock was up slightly following its previous earnings report, in July. The carrier has been dealing with the fallout of the Boeing (BA) 737 Max grounding, and...
description: Southwest Airlines stock rose Thursday on the heels of a better-than-expected third-quarter earnings report.
